car_owner_location.title: Car Owner Location
car_owner_location.description: JSON string with keys: latitude, longitude, name, address. Example: {"latitude": 5.5826, "longitude": -0.1435, "name": "Car Owner", "address": "Accra"}

destination.title: Destination
destination.description: JSON string with keys: latitude, longitude, name, address. Example: {"latitude": 5.582636441579255, "longitude": -0.143551646497661, "name": "Office", "address": "innngen"}

route_preferences.title: Route Preferences
route_preferences.description: JSON string with route preferences. Example: {"max_detour_distance": 5.0, "max_detour_time": 15, "prefer_same_direction": true}

office_location.title: Office Location
office_location.description: JSON string with keys: latitude, longitude, name. Example: {"latitude": 5.582636441579255, "longitude": -0.143551646497661, "name": "innngen"}

pickup_time.title: Pickup Time
pickup_time.description: Preferred pickup time in HH:MM format

dropoff_time.title: Dropoff Time
dropoff_time.description: Preferred dropoff time in HH:MM format

available_seats.title: Available Seats
available_seats.description: Number of available seats in the car
